sentences.english: referring jaundiced babies for diagnosis and possible treatment;
sentences.chinese: 對有黃疸的嬰兒進行診斷並給予可能的治療。

sentences.english: Yellowness of the eyes is one of the symptoms of jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛發黃是黃疸病的症狀之一。

sentences.english: Objective To observe effects of liver enzyme inducer on preterm infant jaundice by using early.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察早期應用肝酶誘導劑對早產兒黃疸的影響。

sentences.english: Objective discuss the function of smecta on neonate Breast-feeding jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探討思密達在新生兒母乳性黃疸中的作用。

sentences.english: She presented with a clinical picture of fever and jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 患者的臨牀徵象爲發熱和黃疸。

sentences.english: The main clinical features were early and severe jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀上以黃疸出現早而重爲其特徵。

sentences.english: Conclusion Cholestasis probably exists in neonates with pathologic jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 結論病理性黃疸患兒可能存在膽汁淤積。

sentences.english: On admission there was a moderate degree of jaundice and a small scar above the left costal margin.
sentences.chinese: 住院時，在左肋緣上方有中等度黃疸和一個小疤痕。

sentences.english: Most fatalities occur in patients who develop the haemorrhagic icterus form.
sentences.chinese: 大多數死亡是有出血性黃疸症狀的患者。

sentences.english: The "yellow" in the name refers to the jaundice that affects some patients.
sentences.chinese: 病名中的“黃”是指影響一些患者的黃疸。

sentences.english: Hemolytic icterus occurs in the neonate of the horse and swine.
sentences.chinese: 溶血性黃疸發生於馬和豬的初生幼畜。

sentences.english: Hemolytic anemia, hemoglobinuria, jaundice & mucous membrane petechiation.
sentences.chinese: 溶血性貧血，血紅蛋白尿，黃疸，粘膜有瘀點。

sentences.english: Laxative, gall bladder, typhoid, jaundice, improves appetite.
sentences.chinese: 潤腸通便，膽，傷寒，黃疸，改善食慾。

sentences.english: If icteric with anaemia more serious, can make cure of the blood transfusion that change blood and phototherapy .
sentences.chinese: 如果黃疸和貧血較嚴重，可作換血輸血治療和光療。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tuihuangling oral Liquid is effective in the treatment of …
sentences.chinese: 結論退黃靈口服液是治療新生兒黃疸的一種有效製劑。

sentences.english: Objective To observer the therapeutic efficacy of ahylysantinfarctase injection in acute icteric hepatitis B (AIHB).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察腹蛇抗酶治療急性黃疸型乙肝炎的療效。

definition: injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
